title: Loss
verses: Revelation 21:4 (WEB) — “He will wipe away every tear.”
John 11:25–26 (WEB) — “I am the resurrection and the life.”
1 Thessalonians 4:13–14 (WEB) — “Don’t grieve like the rest who have no hope.”
Psalm 147:3 (WEB) — “He heals the broken in heart.”
body: Grief is love in pain. Jesus weeps with you and promises resurrection. Lament honestly; receive comfort from God and His people. Hope doesn’t erase grief—it redeems it.
prayer: God of all comfort, hold my heart. Heal what is broken and anchor me in the hope of Christ’s resurrection. Amen.
